item.title: Why You're Mad At Trump
item.description: A lot of people seem to be mad at Trump. You might be one of them. You probably think you know why you’re mad at him. For instance, you might not like what he said about the judge in a lawsuit he’s involved with. Or maybe you didn’t like what he said about Rosie O’Donnell. You might even be mad that he said Saddam Hussein was a bad man who was good at killing terrorists.
